phrase.item: you are your mother's precious golden jewellery
You are your mother's handsome son.
You are your mother's handsome son.
You are your mother's most pampered one.
You are your mother's most pampered one.
You are your mother's precious golden jewellery.
You are your mother's precious golden jewellery
You are for your mother the sound of the waterfall.
You are for your mother the raindrops dropping from the sky.
You are for your mother the raindrops dropping from the sky.
You are a grape in your mother's garden.
You are a grape in your mother's garden.
You are for your mother like a thousand medicines.
You are for your mother like a thousand medicines.
Oh little baby, lalaj, lalaj, lalaj!
